page.title: 05NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: In June l984,Duke St.Junior School 6-aside football team won through to the "Smith's Cup" national finals at Wembley. Two coaches of supporters travelled to the Stadium for this momentous occasion in front of 35,000 people.Although we lost, the thrill of walking up the players' tunnel,playing on the famous turf and climbing the steps to the royal box, will remain in the boys' memories throughout their lives. The new housing development at Eaves Green is to be finished by l986.It forms the southern most development of Central Lancs New Town.All the housing is low-rise with a low density per acre.There are plans to divert traffic from the town centre of Chorley along a by-pass following the line of Duke Street.
